bwwExcerpt: But aside from the serious stuff, “Wicked” is a bright, fizzing, sparkly spectacle of a musical. Taking cues from the original “Wizard of Oz,” much of the musical feels like it’s in Technicolor, whether in Glinda’s pink dresses or in the verdant lights of the Emerald City.

wrongFullText: Because you are coming from a location (Virginia) covered by a Privacy Law, many of the features of TribLIVE.com, like videos and social media elements are disabled.
